Bens/Rubys: {{prefix}}disable DROPS

help.ahegao: アヘ顔 (Ahegao) - Nunca vais saber quando isto vai ser útil.

help.autorole: Add, Remove, or List Self-Assignable Roles

help.welcome: Set messages for when someone joins the Server

help.equip: Equip medals you have received from Achievements or bought from the store.

menu.goaway: Como eu tenho coisas para fazer, eu vou dar uma volta enquanto tu decides-te. Chama-me de novo quando te decidires.
menu.chargeB: _da tua conta. Eu volto em um minuto com a tua encomenda! Ok?

nuke.confirm:
:radioactive: **__Isto vai resetar todas as definições do servidor, incluindo:__**
```
 -Prefixo
 -ModRoles
 -Comandos e módulos ligados/desligados
 -Deixar cair Rubys vai ficar DESLIGADO
 -Mensagens de LevelUP vão ficar LIGADAS
 -Reações personalizadas vão ser limpas
 -Canais de logs
```
 -Este nuke vai ser notificado no meu servidor de suporte, para todos verem a merda que tu fizeste.
 -Tu não poderás fazer nuke por 48 horas, e se abusares deste comando, eu decido se tu estás a abusar ou não. Abuso recorrente e eu bloqueio o comando no servidor.


 **Queres MESMO que eu mande nukes?** 
 Envia **ok** para sim, **c** para cancelar.
nuke.confirmB:
**Escreve a razão do nuke em baixo para confimar**
Envia **c** para cancelar.
nuke.completed: As informações do servidor foram completamente limpas e resetadas. Tenta usar **+serverinfo** para ver se tudo foi resetado bem. Eu não sou responsável por alguma contaminação de Fallout Nuclear.

usage.logs:
`{{prefix}}logs #canal`
 Define todas as logs no canal escolhido

`{{prefix}}logs mod #canal`
 Define logs de moderação (Kick, Ban e Mute) no canal escolhido

`{{prefix}}logs atv #canal`
 Define logs de atividade (Entrada e saída de membros, mudança de nicks) no canal escolhido

`{{prefix}}logs adv #canal`
 Define logs avançadas (Mensagens editadas e apagadas, canais criados, ativação ou desativação de módulos) no canal escolhido

`{{prefix}}logs mod #canal delete`
Logs não irão ser mais enviadas neste canal
usage.ahegao: Muito símples, apenas escreve `{{prefix}}ahegao` e tu ganhas um アヘ顔
usage.announce: `{{prefix}}announce [mensagem a anunciar]` Ex.: `{{prefix}}annouce Hoje vou dar donuts grátis!`
usage.disable:
`{{prefix}}disable [command or módule] [scope]`
 Disable specific commands or modules within the desired scope. (Channel or Server)

`{{prefix}}disable nsfw c`
 Disable the commands from NSFW module at the Channel (c).

`{{prefix}}disable say s`
 Disable the `{{prefix}}say` command in the entire Server (s).
usage.drop:
`{{prefix}}drop [X]`
 and good luck for the quickest. Whoever types `{{prefix}}pick` first takes everything!
usage.enable:
`{{prefix}}enable [command or módule] [scope]`
 Enable specific commands or modules within the desired scope. (Channel or Server)

`{{prefix}}enable nsfw c`
 Enable the commands from NSFW module at the Channel (c).

`{{prefix}}enable say s`
 Enable the `{{prefix}}say` command in the entire Server (s).
usage.give: `{{prefix}}give [X] @someguy` to give X Rubines to your buddy.
usage.kick:
`{{prefix}}kick @someguy [reason]`
Kicks @someguy from the Server. You can also add a reason, just in case.
usage.pick: I'm sure you can figure this one out on your own.
usage.prefixSet:
`{{prefix}}prefixSet [prefix]` and be careful not to mess it up.
Example: `{{prefix}}prefixSet pol.`
usage.profile: `{{prefix}}profile` for your own `{{prefix}}profile @someguy` for someone else's Profilecard
usage.cash:
`{{prefix}}cash`,`{{prefix}}Rubine`,`{{prefix}}$`
 You can also @mention someone to check how many Rubines they have
usage.switch: `{{prefix}}switch [X]` Don't give me a bad image, I already have to work with YOU.
usage.invite: You just needed to NOT include HELP in the command...
usage.cashrank:
`{{prefix}}cashrank` or `{{prefix}}Rubinerank` = Global
`{{prefix}}cashrank server` or `{{prefix}}Rubinerank server` = Server Only
usage.rule34:
`{{prefix}}rule34 [tags]`
For spacing use  _ :`{{prefix}}rule34 blue_hair`
For multiple tags use + :`{{prefix}}rule34 blue_hair+pointy_ears`
For filtering a certain tag, use - before it: `{{prefix}}rule34 blue_hair+pointy_ears+-furry`
usage.safe:
`{{prefix}}safe[tags]`
For spacing use  _ :`{{prefix}}safe blue_hair`
For multiple tags use + :`{{prefix}}safe blue_hair+pointy_ears`
For filtering a certain tag, use - before it: `{{prefix}}safe blue_hair+pointy_ears+-furry`
usage.ping: I didn't realize you were so inept. It's {{prefix}}ping
usage.betflip:
`{{prefix}}betflip X [heads | tails]`
Example:`{{prefix}}betflip 5 heads`
Minimum bet is 3 Rubines
usage.ban:
`{{prefix}}ban @someguy [reason]`
Bans @someguy from the Server, You can also add a reason.
usage.autorole:
`{{prefix}}autorole [add | rem | list] [Role| @role]` 

`{{prefix}}autorole add Games` Allows the **Games** Role as self-assignable.
`{{prefix}}autorole rem Games` Removes the role **Games** da lista.
`{{prefix}}autorole list` Shows the list and commands for each Self-Assignable Role

 Type the Role name exactly as registered, case sensitive. Or just @mention it
usage.background:
`{{prefix}}background [Imagecode]`

 :warning: **IMPORTANT:** 
*Imagecode* __are not links__, are codes obtained from http://www.pollux.fun/bgshop. 

Example: `{{prefix}}background IlyEEDBj0GLLlFl8n6boPLSkADNuBwke`
usage.bye:
`{{prefix}}bye [msg|timer|chn] [message|seconds|channel]` 

`{{prefix}}bye msg Goodbye %user% !`
 Changes the message to "Goodbye @User !"

`{{prefix}}bye timer 10`
 Set a time in seconds for auto deletion, 0 for keep it forever.

`{{prefix}}bye`
Without any parameters, this command will toggle on and off the emittion of messages.

**Wildcards**:
`%user%` Mentions the user.
`%username%` Outputs the user's name, without mention.
usage.welcome:
`{{prefix}}welcome [msg|timer|chn] [message|seconds|channel]` 

`{{prefix}}welcome  msg Welcome %user% !`
 Changes the message to "Welcome @User !"

`{{prefix}}welcome timer 10`
 Set a time in seconds for auto deletion, 0 for keep it forever.

`{{prefix}}welcome `
Without any parameters, this command will toggle on and off Welcome messages.

**Wildcards**:
`%user%` Mentions the user.
`%username%` Outputs the user's name, without mention.
usage.clear:
`{{prefix}}clear X`
**Attention** X must be __Greater than 1__ and __Lower than 101__.
I'm sure you can do the math without help.
usage.equip:
`{{prefix}}equip`
And then click the reactions to navigate, be sure to let them load before clicking
usage.fausto:
`{{prefix}}faustão`
 Needs the MANAGE WEBHOOKS permission to work.
usage.puto: Only available on the following languages: [PT-BR]
usage.menesueco: Only available on the following languages: [PT-BR]
usage.otaco: Only available on the following languages: [PT-BR]
usage.pasquale: Only available on the following languages: [PT-BR]
usage.morse: `{{prefix}}morse [text]` You should be in a voice channel
usage.read:
`{{prefix}}read` Gets last image posted if available on cache
`{{prefix}} read [ url|image attachment ]` Reads text contained on an image attached or linked
usage.roll:
`{{prefix}}roll [Amount][d[Faces]][extra operations]`
`{{prefix}}roll d20` `{{prefix}}roll 5d6` `{{prefix}}roll 150d12` `{{prefix}}roll 10d4 + 8` `{{prefix}}roll d12 - 10` `{{prefix}}roll 60d7 / 7` `{{prefix}}roll 1d100*5`

 Add thrill to your rolls by adding a delay (In seconds): `{{prefix}}roll 1d20 -t 5`
usage.medal:
`{{prefix}}medal [medal_id]` or just `{{prefix}}medal`
 For example: `{{prefix}}medal darkmagirl` for the **Dark Magician Girl** medal.
usage.exchange:
`{{prefix}}exchange [Amount] [Destination Currency Code]` 
e.g `{{prefix}}exchange 28 DUT` Exchanges 28 Rubines into DueUtil Credits.
usage.daily:
`{{prefix}}daily` to get your daily bonus, streak 10 days in a row for a higher bonus1
 `{{prefix}}daily info` to more information about times and streak.
usage.selfroles:
`{{prefix}}selfroles [add | del | list] [Role| @role | Role ID] ["Shorthand"]` 

`{{prefix}}selfroles add Games` Allows the **Games** Role as self-assignable.
`{{prefix}}selfroles del Games` Removes the role **Games** from the list.
`{{prefix}}selfroles list` Shows the list and commands for each Self-Assignable Role

 These are Case insensitive, you can use Role ID too.
`{{prefix}}selfroles clear` Deletes **all** selfroles from the list.
usage.prune:
`{{prefix}}prune X [@user | user ID]`
You can use the user's ID if mentioning is not available, as in `{{prefix}}prune 50 271394014358405121`, If no user is specified, it defaults to Pollux's messages.

**Attention** X must be __Greater than 1__ and __Lower than 101__.
Basic math, I'm sure you can do it.
usage.eggtrade:
**Making a Trade**
`{{prefix}}eggtrade [Egg ID] @someone`
E.g.`{{prefix}}eggtrade U2 @someone` Will trade the *Aquamarine Pulse Egg* with *@Someone*

**Accepting a Trade**
To accept an incoming trade, you have 30s to respond the offer with *accept* + one of your Eggs' ID, only two-way trades are allowed.
`accept SR1` Will send *Dark Magician Egg* in exchange for the *Aquamarine Pulse Egg* sent by the first user.

**You can only trade every 2 hours, so be careful. __Missed trades will use up your cooldown!__**
usage.lewd:
`{{prefix}}lewd`
You can also choose from which curator you will want to see the picks from! Just type their name after the command like `{{prefix}}lewd pollyanna` for example, to see only stuff curated by **Pollyanna**.

 Our current curator squad is:
 {{squad}}
usage.marry:
Marriage relies directly on `{{prefix}}craft`, since you need a ring before you can propose.

To marry your loved one, do `{{prefix}}marry @user [ring]`. There are 4 tiers of wedding rings, each one made of a different gemstone, to show off how fancy your marriage is. In the future, higher rank rings will provide the couple more Love Points that they will be able to spend together.

Example usage: `{{prefix}}marry @someone rubine` to propose with a Rubine ring.

Requires Embed, Manage Messages and Reaction Permissions
usage.craft:
`{{prefix}}craft [item code]`
 You can find the item code and all information at http://pollux.fun/crafting.

To craft an item you need to own all required materials, some materials need to be crafted in order to be available, those are not autocrafted when doing a higher tier item.
usage.divorce:
`{{prefix}}divorce` To show everyone you are married to. whether that is one person or a whole harem!
`{{prefix}}divorce [@user || Discord ID]` To divorce that person

equip.unequipConfirm: Is this the one you want to unequip?
equip.equipTwice: You already have this medal equipped!

website.nukedes:
This will wipe ALL server-specific options and settings, achievements, bank items, cherry modules and all custom data will be lost forever, there's no way to revert this.
Only the server owner can use issue a nuke.

blackjack.ongoing: You should really finish a game before trying to start another.
blackjack.newgame: Blackjack huh? You should already know the rules, so let's get started.
blackjack.youlose: Oh? I've won, to bad for you.
blackjack.hit: Respond with `hit` to draw one more card,
blackjack.double: `double down` to double your bet and draw one last card,
blackjack.even: We broke even, in that case the house wins~ Your Rubines stay with me.

slots.kommunism: Communist Jackpot! Your prize has been redistributed among the populous, you get 3x what they do.
slots.pollux_jackpot: Oh my, Seems to be three of me. Perhaps you deserve something, Extra.
slots.jackpot: In addition to your prize, you have also gained 100 rings and an extra life
slots.bonanza: So many Rubines! Hope you don't plan on making me carry all these.
slots.potato: Potatoes... I can probably make something out of these for you.
slots.zero_1: Oh my, seems all your Rubines are mine now.
slots.zero_2: Not a single hit? that's a shame.
slots.zero_3: Perhaps if you try again you might win something?

games.ceilingBet: You can't bet more than **{{number}}** %emj% Rubines in this game.

loot.rareDrop: Do you know what is this? It is a **RARE** Lootbox!
loot.ultraRareDrop: I can't believe it, an **ULTRA RARE** Lootbox has dropped! you may never see one again!

lootDrop.1: Oh my, a Lootbox has just spawned in this channel!
lootDrop.3: Someone seems to have dropped a Lootbox here.
lootDrop.4: Sorry to interrupt, but did anyone notice this Lootbox lying over here?
lootDrop.5: Amazing! Look at what I've found!

loot.lootPick: You all have **__20 Seconds__** to dispute it! Type `{{prefix}}pick` for a chance to claim it!
loot.goesTo:
Time's up! Let's see who's getting this Box.
**This Loot Box will be raffled between:**
loot.congrats: Well done! The box has been added to your inventory. You can open it using the `{{prefix}}lootbox` command.
loot.options: You can either keep it, or reroll it by paying {{amt}}
loot.rerolled: Let's try again, rerolling the box content...
loot.noMoreRolls: You've ran out of rerolls, you'll have to stick with this result.
loot.noFunds: You need more Rubines to reroll, perhaps next time.
loot.addedRubines: {{X}} Rubines have been added to your Balance
loot.addedJades: {{X}} Jades have been added to your Pouch
loot.addedMedal: **{{itm}}** Medal has been added to your Inventory
loot.addedSticker: **{{itm}}** Sticker has been added to your Inventory
loot.addedBG: Background `[code:{{itm}}]` has been added to your Inventory
loot.duplicateExchange: Duplicate {{tpe}} `{{itm}}` has been exchanged for {{X}} Rubines
loot.morons: You let a Lootbox slip by? What am I saying, of course you did.
loot.eventDrop: And there is more! This box is an **EVENT BOX** which means **special goodies inside!**
loot.notThisbox: You don't seem to have that box. try `{{prefix}}lootbox` again and see the boxes you own.

eastereggs.konodioda: You thought that it was Pollux, **but it was ME, DIO**!
eastereggs.vacuum: **{{user}}** has given **+1 Rep** to the Vacuum. {{amount}} reps has been thrown into the void so far.

discoin.desc: Your Rubines are being sent, a response from %BOT% will come as soon as it arrives.
discoin.unverified:
You are not verified to make exchanges.
Please verify yourself at [http://discoin.sidetrip.xyz/verify]
discoin.userLimit: Your exchange limit for today has been reached!
discoin.globalLimit: You've reached your Discoin limit, try again tomorrow.
discoin.takedis: Keep this code in case your Rubines don't reach their destination.

event.next: Available again in this Server at {{remain}}
event.treat: ***Trick or Treat!***  You got **{{qtd}}** candies from this Server's stash!
event.treatRefresh:
No no no! You already got your candies, shoo!
You can come back in **{{remaining}}**
event.current_event:
Hey~ Did you know there is a global **Halloween Event** going on? :jack_o_lantern:
In this event you can get some cool and __exclusive__ pretty stuff for your `p!profile` card!
Available only during this event, which will be running until **November 5th**
More info at <http://pollux.fun/events/haloween> *(page in english)*
*Contact your Server Owner to check if this server is participating*
event.newAccOut: :warning: Sorry, new accounts cannot participate. Perhaps you can join the next one.
event.newServer: New Servers cannot participate in this event. Contact the Developer or join the Support Server if you want to participate in the event with this Server.
event.newJoin: This Server cannot participate in this event because I've joined here after October 1st. Contact the Developer or join the Support Server if you want to participate in the event with this Server
event.nextThis: You can Trick or Treat here again at:
event.candiesCheck: You collected **{{amt}}** candies so far. Keep knocking at servers to get more!
event.candieRank: These are the most candy-rich guys around the block
event.candyprize: The best ranked users will get some nice rewards at the end of the event!
event.droprates: This Server's Event Box drop rate has been increased by **{{amount}}x**
event.bori_receive: Borealis received **{{herKeys}} Keys** %EMJ% from this Server
event.absentElf: Seems like {{elfie}} is not around, try again later.
event.shopUpdate:
{{role2}} {{role1}}:
 The trader has **new items** in stock!
event.noFunds_key: Hmmm... seems that you don't have enough Keys
event.austra_buy: Is that the item you'd like? For **{{price}}** Winding Keys it can be all yours! Deal?
event.austra_checkout: **Done!** It has been a great pleasure doing business with you~!
event.austra_noFunds: Sorry, we're both wasting our times here. You don't have enough Keys for that. But I can give it to you anyways if you give me **{{rubAmount}}** Rubines.
event.austra_ultimatePoverty: ...which apparently you don't have either. Shoo!
event.austra_exg: I can exchange my Keys for a fair amount of your Rubines, but I'm much more interested in Keys.Use commands like these to exchange with me:
event.help_elf: Checks if there are elves around
event.australis_bio: Australis is the elf of Midsummer Xmas, at Santa's southern assembly lines. Since Santa doesn't supervise them, she does everything within her reach to get back lost Winding Keys, even sneaking goodies and reselling them for a much lower price
event.borealis_bio: Borealis is a young part-time elf from Santa's main assembly lines at the North Pole. She volunteered to help find the lost Winding Keys. She's one of Santa's favorite apprentices, so he takes her suggestions quite seriously.
event.au_function: Australis trades Items for Winding Keys, the Rarity Tier of the items depends on how much keys she already has.
event.bo_function: Borealis collects Winding Keys and takes them back to Santa. The Drop Rate of Event Lootboxes is increased significantly based on how many keys she has.
event.elfAppears:
{{notify_roles}}:
One of Santa's elves just spawned in this server!
**{{aust_or_borea}}** will be here for {{amount}} hours. Use `{{prefix}}{{elf}}` to talk to her.
event.automessage:
**PolluXmas Global Event Info**
This channel will be used to post event updates for this Server.

Updates include:
  - *Santa's elves Spawns*
  - *New items with the Trader Elf*
  - *Drop Rate updates from Collector Elf*

There are three Utility Roles for this event, get them if you want to be notified.
{{genericRole}} - for **all** updates.
{{austri}} - for **trader** updates.
{{bori}} - for **collector** updates.
event.traderElfText:
I need some Winding Keys that were lost from Santa's Factory, have you seen any?
**I can exchange them for some neat goodies!**
event.collectorElfText:
I'm Collecting lost Winding Keys from servers, have you seen any?
**With these keys we will be able to deliver Present Boxes faster to your server!**
event.theseElf: These are the elves that are currently in this server:
event.thisElf: This is the elf that is currently in this server:
event.noElf: There is no elf currently in this server:
event.configIntro: PolluXmas event has been configured in your server! Feel free to move around and rename these roles and Channels, if you delete them, you may need to run autoconfig again. **All event progress will be lost if you do so.**
event.configInfo:
Tell your members to use these roles to get notifications about the event and/or to be notified about their preferred elf spawning.
**DO __NOT__ EDIT POLLUX PERMS ON THE EVENT CHANNEL!** The developer cannot recover lost event data if that ever occurs.
event.thankKys: Thanks a lot! Santa may deliver presents here **{{amount}}x** faster now due to your kindness~
event.howmanyKys: Ah, thank you! How many keys do you have to give me?
event.noFunds_bo: It seems you don't have that many keys.
event.egghunt: ***{{user}}** is looking around for eggs in this channel...*
event.egghuntsuccess: Great! There's an egg here! Let's see...
event.egghuntsuccess3:
You have a total of **{{X}}** eggs with you.
**{{Y}}** of them are unique.

More info at: [Pollux Easter Event 2018](https://pollux.fun/events/easter2018)
event.delaytrade: Hold on! You can trade eggs again in {{remaining}}
event.wanttrade2:
*To accept it, type `accept` followed by the ID of the Egg you're sending back.*

E.g. `accept C1` to give a [**C1**] Egg in exchange for this [**{{eggcode}}**] Egg
event.noegginvent: This egg either doesn't exist or isn't in your inventory.
event.needegg: You need to specify an egg to give in return!

langIntro.global: I'll speak English from now on. Maybe I'll even be polite.
langIntro.channel: I'll speak english here, just for you.

info.checkPin: Check the Pinned Message for more Info
info.reactThis: React to this message to auto-receive the roles

divorce.confirmdiag: Do you agree in divorcing from {{user}}? A divorce fee of %EMJ%**5000 Rubines** will be charged from **both** of you! Both of your LovePoints will be **halved**!
divorce.saidnope: {{userB}} doesn't want to divorce. You can force it by paying %EMJ%**10000 Rubines** so I can call in a lawyer to resolve this, but both of you will lose **all of your LovePoints** !
divorce.saidnothing: {{userB}} doesn't seem to be around to say anything. You can still force a one-sided divorce by paying %EMJ%**15000 Rubines** so I can call in a lawyer to resolve this, but you will lose **all of your LovePoints** alone!
divorce.forced_rej: Alright. I called in a Lawyer to deal with the situation, you're no longer married!
divorce.info:
Unhappy with your loved one? You can undo your marriage anytime by paying some Rubines.
You can do this friendly if your counterpart agrees, or you can call-in a lawyer to get things done.

Divorcing will consume love points from both parts. So please be sure that this is what you want. The ring used in this marriage **will be destroyed**!
